# File lib/midilib/io/midifile.rb, line 425
    def write_var_len(val)
        if val.zero?
            putc(0)
            return
        end

        buf = []

        buf << (val & 0x7f)
        while (value >>= 7) > 0
            buf << (val & 0x7f) | 0x80
        end

        buf.reverse.each { | b | putc(b) }
    end
